column1: The MSc prepares you to work as a business manager in an international environment. It gives you experience of a wide range of modules covering many aspects of international business. These include:Accounting and FinanceGlobal EconomicsManagementMarketing and Global MarketingInternational BusinessResearch MethodsStrategic ManagementYou finish your course by completing a Dissertation.For more details of course content, see the indicative modules section below.
Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
